subject: Re: Alexander MacRae's EVP Work...
author: Staten Island Paranormal
full_text:
That would be awesome, but Chris said not everyone would be able to use 
them?  Is that true, Frank, that only certain people were supposed to 
be able to use the boxes?

Amy
SIParanormal

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
>
> you know frank, maybe making these boxes will be your FT calling. I 
bet that if you started looking for partners and financial backing that 
people would come out of the woodwork to back you. Putting these into 
production might be a good thing. Not to mention the people that would 
colaborate to help out with any design flaws.
>   just a thought. 
>
